long_description: Delicious nutrition bar with less than 200 calories was created by women for women to meet the specific nutritional needs of active females. Now with 30% more fiber and at least 25% less sugar for help with digestion, weight management and to lower risk of heart disease. A portion of the proceeds of the sale of Luna bars will be donated to The Breast Cancer Fund. Includes calcium for healthy bones, protein to rebuild muscle, anti-oxidants for overall wellness, plus folic acid and soy for a healthy heart. Contains 23 vitamins, minerals and nutrients that make a significant contribution to meeting the RDA for women. All Luna Bar flavors are made with at least 70% organic ingredients. Completely free of wheat, dairy, trans fats and hydrogenated oils; certified Kosher. All vitamins and minerals are sourced from plants and fruits with no artificial sweeteners, colors or preservatives. For additional ingredient and nutrition information, please see the PDF file located below. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Delicious nutrition bar with less than 200 calories was created by women for women to meet the specific nutritional needs of active females.
